text: Aleksey Tsvetkov (born 1 September 1981) is a Russian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Russia Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Yekaterinburg
title: Aleksey Tsvetkov
